document.title: Upper Teeth Alignment with Clear Aligners
document.summary: This treatment uses clear aligners to straighten your upper teeth, taking approximately 4–6 months. Progress will be primarily monitored remotely, with some attachments used to assist in the alignment process.
key_points: Clear aligners will be used for the upper teeth.
Some attachments will be used to aid alignment.
next_steps: Proceed with scheduling your initial fitting appointment.
Ensure you understand how to use and care for your aligners.
